TransactionStateContext.InvestmentState: When users deposit ether using the invest function.
TransactionStateContext.ResetState: When the resetInvestment function is called to distribute the jackpot and reset the contract.

ExternalInteractions.EtherTransfers: Transfers ether between users and the contract address in invest and resetInvestment functions.
ExternalInteractions.OwnerInteraction: The contract owner can initialize the contract with 1 ether upon deployment.
